entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
